song.title: Let us with a gladsome mind
song.text:
# Let us with a gladsome mind praise the Lord for He is kind:
* 1.-5. For His mercies shall endure, ever faithful, eversure.
# He with all commanding might, filled the new-made world with light:
# He his chosen race did bless in the wasterful wilderness:
# He hath, with a piteous eye, looked upon our misery:
# Let us then with gladsome mind praise the Lord for He is kind:
